headline: NVIDIA Kicks Off the Next Generation of AI With Rubin — Six New Chips, One Incredible AI Supercomputer
summary: Extreme Codesign Across NVIDIA Vera CPU, Rubin GPU, NVLink 6 Switch, ConnectX-9 SuperNIC, BlueField-4 DPU and Spectrum-6 Ethernet Switch Slashes Training Time and Inference Token Generation CostNews Summary: The Rubin platform harnesses extreme codesign across hardware and software to deliver up to 10x reduction in inference token cost and 4x reduction in number of GPUs to train MoE models, compared with the NVIDIA Blackwell platform.NVIDIA Spectrum-X Ethernet Photonics switch systems deliver 5x

headline: Vertiv Rallies 31% in a Year: Should You Buy the Stock?
summary: VRT rides on accelerating AI infrastructure demand as its expanding portfolio and strategic partnerships strengthen its position in data center markets.

headline: Qualcomm Witnesses Just 8.2% Growth in Past Year: Reason to Worry?
summary: QCOM's 8.2% stock rise trails the industry, as margin pressure, China risks and fierce chip competition weigh on growth.
